org.jruyi.core

Interface IUdpServerBuilder


  • public interface IUdpServerBuilder
    A builder to build an NIO service of UDP server.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUdpServerBuilder bindAddr(java.lang.String bindAddr)
      Sets the address to bind.
      <I,O> INioService<I,O,? extends IUdpServerConfiguration> build()
      Builds a new UDP server.
      IUdpServerBuilder initCapacityOfChannelMap(int initCapacityOfChannelMap)
      Sets the initial capacity of the map holding UDP channels.
      IUdpServerBuilder port(int port)
      Sets the port to listen on.
      IUdpServerBuilder serviceId(java.lang.String serviceId)
      Sets the service ID of the UDP server to be built.

    • Method Detail

      • serviceId

        IUdpServerBuilder serviceId(java.lang.String serviceId)
        Sets the service ID of the UDP server to be built.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the service ID to set
        Returns:
        this builder

      • bindAddr

        IUdpServerBuilder bindAddr(java.lang.String bindAddr)
        Sets the address to bind. Sets null to bind ANY addresses.
        Parameters:
        bindAddr - the address to bind
        Returns:
        this builder

      • port

        IUdpServerBuilder port(int port)
        Sets the port to listen on. This is a mandatory property to build a UDP server.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to listen on
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified port is negative or greater than 65535

      • initCapacityOfChannelMap

        IUdpServerBuilder initCapacityOfChannelMap(int initCapacityOfChannelMap)
        Sets the initial capacity of the map holding UDP channels.
        Parameters:
        initCapacityOfChannelMap - initial capacity to set
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified initCapacityOfChannelMap is less than 4

      • build

        <I,O> INioService<I,O,? extends IUdpServerConfiguration> build()
        Builds a new UDP server.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of the inbound data
        O - the type of the outbound data
        Returns:
        a new UDP client
